comprehensive_overview: Iso-Seq3 is a package for transcriptome sequencing that aims at generating full-length cDNA sequences to accurately characterize the transcriptome landscape. It is designed to process Iso-Seq data obtained from a PacBio Sequel instrument for high-quality transcript reconstruction and analysis.
core_features: Full-length cDNA sequencing for transcriptome analysis
Data processing from PacBio Sequel instrument
Identification of alternative splicing events and fusion transcripts
